name: Sanib
description:
Multiplayer Fighting Game.

Can only be played by 2-3 people

atleast 2 game controllers is recommended

Can also be played with one Controller and one on the keyboard.

The game features

Magellan

Heneral Luna

Andres Bonifacio

Lapu Lapu

Rizal

in a fighting game

with 3 stages:

Intramuros

Manila Bay

Banawe Rice Terraces

note: if you dont know who they are and where this is, these are Filipino historical characters in Areas at Philippines
